New Records: Zach Neto became the first Angels infielder to achieve a 20-20 season
Key Match Events: Spencer Torkelson struck out with the bases loaded in the eighth inning
Zach Neto hit a 400-foot two-run home run in the fifth inning
Pre-Game Insights: The Tigers were on the verge of their longest winning streak since July 2021
The Angels selected Zach Neto one pick after the Tigers took Jace Jung at No. 12 overall in the 2022 draft
Post-Match Reflections: Manager A.J. Hinch discussed the challenges faced by the Tigers' pitcher Montero
The Tigers finished 0-for-8 with runners in scoring position
Miscellaneous Highlights: Right-hander Jack Kochanowicz pitched six scoreless innings for the Angels
Tigers had scoring opportunities in the third, fourth, and sixth innings against Kochanowicz
